JAMES H. POUND, CHIEF COUNSEL FOR ROOSEVELT, AN OLD …

JAMES H. POUND of Detroit who is chief counsel for Col Theodore Roosevelt in the former president's action for libel against George A Newett the Ishpeming ...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks Richard Arthur Norton.  A photo of James H. Pound, chief counsel for Colonel Roosevelt  in the "American review of reviews", v. 48, 1913, p. 16, (Google Books)  resembles the man in the Bain image.  We will add more information to the description when we update the database.
